attributes.action: Rules for the media on reporting; less scarmongering to sell papers.
attributes.additional_details: The mental health of the nation has suffered during this crises; much of which can be attributed to the medias reporting, incorrect information and dramatic wording. Journalism should be based on checked facts and not just there to sell papers.
attributes.background: Rules to be set in place for the media. Making sure all articles/pieces are based on fact and not just scaremongering to sell.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Replace the current press self regulatory system with a statutory regulator: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300246

To create a public inquiry into the media reporting and presenting of the virus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318334

Criminalise the publication of unfounded false statements by the media: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303050
